Searching for

Talents

We are in need of talents!

If you have any skills in writing, design or development please look for us for job offers. Here at Piup you can be whoever you want!

If you don't have any of those tallents but know someone trustable that would like to work with us, please feel free to recommend them to our staff via email on hr@piup.com.

piup

We are a farm that always focus on sustainability and improving results for production and clients. Here at piup©, you are our most valuable resource for archieving our goals, and we look foward for always doing you the best, as you do your best for our clients! =D

Facing problems with the website?

If you have suggestions or found a bug, please report it to your supervisor as soon as possible.

On the other hand, if you can't log in, forgot your password or want any kind of troubleshooting, please report it at THIS PAGE and we will manage to fix it as fast as we can.
